EmailTemplate.description: Created for request R151468 | This survey has been sending to customers with a closed case as of 12/2016
EmailTemplate.name: Case Closed tNPS Email
EmailTemplate.subject: MyCase Website Customer Experience Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MyCase Website Customer Experience Survey
Hello!
Would you please take a moment to answer our brief one minute survey?
Your feedback helps us continue to improve your experience with MyCase.
https://survey.alchemer.com/s3/6350898/MyCase-Website-Customer-Experience-Survey?c={!Case.ContactId}&a={!Case.AccountId}&ca={!Case.Id}&e={!Case.OwnerId}
Thank you for your time and thoughts, we appreciate your feedback!
Chelsea Lincoln Website Operations Manager MyCase www.mycase.com
